feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: She began to like Mrs. Fisher.

causedBy.name: Mrs. Fisher showing concern for her health

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: A faint wonder came into Scrap’s eyes. Have you a mother?

causedBy.name: Mrs. Fisher asking about her mother
Realizing nobody at San Salvatore knew about her background

feels.name: Disapproval
feels.quote: What _I_ dislike is the pose of the modern young woman.

feels.name: Sternness
feels.quote: Absurd. That’s what you are made for, young women like you.
